titles: A defence of The short view of the profaneness and immorality of the English stage, &c. being a reply to Mr. Congreve's Amendments, &c. and to the vindication of the author of The relapse / by Jeremy Collier ...
author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
publisher: Printed for S. Keble ... R. Sare ... and H. Hindmarsh ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726. --  Short view of the immorality and profaneness of the English stage.
